<i data-lucide='dollar-sign' class='post-icon'></i> <b>Budget Deficits & Money Creation</b><br><br>Government budget deficits create money in the economy through Treasury securities and banking system operations.<br><br><i data-lucide='book' class='post-icon'></i> <a href="media.html#the-power-of-money"><img src="https://i0.wp.com/blogs.cfainstitute.org/investor/files/2023/07/Book-Review-The-Power-of-Money.png?resize=940%2C575&ssl=1" alt="The Power of Money" style="width: 60px; height: auto; float: left; margin-right: 10px;"></a> <b>The Power of Money</b> by Paul Sheard<br><br>Challenges traditional views on fiscal policy constraints through Modern Monetary Theory.<br><br><a href="media.html#the-power-of-money"><b>View in Media</b></a><br><br><a href="financials.html"><b>View budget and monetary data</b></a>
